titles.title: Expand Qualified Psychologist Services Act
Expand Qualified Psychologist Services Act
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for Medicare coverage and coding for qualified psychologist services furnished by advanced psychology trainees.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Expand Qualified Psychologist Services Act
This bill provides for Medicare coverage of services that are furnished by advanced psychology trainees under the general supervision of clinical psychologists.
